        public boolean add(int selectionNumber,
                   int studentNumber,
                   java.lang.String courseNumber)
        Add a selection Using locking reads to ... 1. Add class time 2. Deduct course remain 3. Insert a selection https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/innodb-locking-reads.html https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/jdbc/basics/transactions.html

        courseNumber - Course's number
        studentNumber - Student's number
        Returns:
        True: Valid, False: Invalid
